item.title: Visual Representation Basics I
item.description: Contents Slides Tweet of the day Lab session: dplyr + ggplot esquisse: ggplot2 add-in Slides Download the slides from today‚Äôs lecture. Tweet of the day Visual encoding is itself a data transformation, often applied after a chain of other transformations. This is ‚Äúfirst week of class‚Äù, table stakes stuff. Sad if true that we don‚Äôt internalize this! ‚Äî Jeffrey Heer (@jeffrey_heer) August 11, 2018 Enrico Bertini is a data visualization researcher at NYU who co-hosts (with Moritz Stefaner) the podcast ‚ÄúData Stories‚Äù, which I highly recommend.

item.title: Introduction to Visual Analytics
item.description: Contents Slides & Lab Tweet of the day: Slides & Lab Introduction to Visual Analytics Lab: Intro to R/RStudio and RMarkdown Create a RStudio.Cloud account rstudio.cloud. Go to our RStudio.Cloud project. Our first exercise will be running Chapter 2: Get started in Kieran Healy, Data Visualization Kieran Healy, Data Visualization: A Practical Introduction (Princeton: Princeton University Press, 2018), http://socviz.co/.
